title: PBE RUNE PAGES
body: Was wondering if riot was going to add the option to buy additional new rune pages onto the pbe?

replies.body: It looks like you can still buy Rune Pages in the store through the Gameplay Tab! There does seem to be a limit on exactly how many you can buy for the moment while they test the new system.
You can buy rune pages but they dont show up I think they are old runepages in the store atm

They are doing special testing on rune page limits right now on Pbe.

Check out this post for more info:
https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/d1Wicwvq-runes-reforged-and-rune-page-limits-testing
